name: Alien Invasion v1.0
description:
Alien invasion is a space themed, endless first person shooter. Aliens are invading the space station and must be stopped! The arena consists of multiple areas  and three weapon types. There are also three enemy types.

Please consider filing out this short survey if you've played the game. The game is developed by a one-man team and each respondent's feedback goes a long way to improving the quality of the game:

https://warrenroche.typeform.com/to/ua6Dil

This game is currently in-development, and I am looking for play-testers to gain useful insight on how the game aught to be changed and improved, before the final release which will come soon.
